column2: Rockport Men's Hydro Sail Black Silver Red Shoe
column22:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • These Hydro Sail shoes from rockport are a fresh take on the classic boating shoes. Made with environment friendly AgION technology which stops odour and provides long lasting protection takes nautical wear to the next level. Team this with denims and striped tees for a yatching inspired look.

    Upper



    • Smooth leather
column23:
mesh and coated mesh upper for maximum breathability
  • Rubber overlays to further add to the midfoot structure and maximum style

  • Sporty colour pops for an urban appeal

  • Fully cushioned collar and tongue for snug Fit

  • Traditional lace-up shoelaces that are specially designed to stay tied

  • Fabric lining offers breathability and comfort for a healthy
column24:
happy foot environment
  • Holder loop made of durable rubber on the collar to hang air dry


    • Midsole



    • adidas adiPRENE footbed with heel cup offers highly shock-absorbent cushioning to protect the heel at impact

    • Superior Hydro motion water drainage and dispersal system in the footbed and the sole

    • Footbed that incorporates silicon bubbles to ensure that the shoe will stay on the foot
column25:
regardless of environmental conditions
  • PU midsole offers durability for long-term wear and shock-absorbent cushioning to help reduce foot fatigue


    • Outsole



    • Rubber outsole delivers grip on wet and dry surfaces to guarantee sure footing

    • Strobel construction offers forefoot flexibility to aid the walking motion

    • Multi directional flex grooves offering maximum flexibility of the feet

    • Rounded sole edges to allow for balance while the boat rocks back and forth


    Shoe care
    Machine wash separately
    Gentle cycle in cold water
    only gentle cycle recommended
    Do not bleach
    Air dry
